SELECT <RUNID>, '<ASSERTIONUUID>', d.conceptid, concat('Current concept (', c.id, ') with "diagnostic" in term not modelled with "Has intent" = "Diagnostic intent": ', term)
assertionText: Current concept with "diagnostic" in term not modelled with "Has intent" = "Diagnostic intent"
